name: 26th International Conference on Neonatology and Perinatology
content: Top Neonatology Conferences | Neonatology conferences 2022 | Global Neonatology Conferences | Neonatologists and Neonatology conferences | Europe | USA | Asia Neonatology 2022 welcomes all of you to join the 26th International Conference on Neonatology and Perinatology which will be held in Dublin, Ireland on 22 -23 August 2022\. Under the theme "Current Trends in Intelligence capacity of Neonatal Research for Covid19", the conference aims to analyse the latest advances and new research in the fields of neonatology, perinatal and paediatrics. Neonatology 2022 brings together renowned neonatologists, obstetricians, gynaecologists, paediatricians, scholars and researchers worldwide. Representatives include major medical schools, hospitals, and the medical/pharmaceutical industry worldwide. Download our brochure: https://neonatology.euroscicon.com/conference-brochure Benefits for you at the event: 1\. Keynote certificate / speaker Certificate 2\. CPD certificate / CME certificate 3\. Best speaker / best young researcher award 4\. Journal Publication with ISSN number 5\. Separate Biography and research page in website. 6\. Conference Kit 7\. Lunch and breakfast.
